messages.title: IT IS a two horse race in Walsall North
messages.content: Labour know it is a two horse race in Walsall North. Labour are so desperate to cling to power that they have resorted to scaring older people by making things up about Conservatives.

messages.title: A message from Helyn Clack
messages.content: It is a great honour and responsibility to be given the chance to be elected your Member of Parliament. I am asking you, the electorate of Walsall North's communities, to elect me to change the future of this country for the better.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Will NOT cut Winter Fuel Allowance. Will NOT cut free TV licences. Will NOT cut free bus passes. Will NOT cut pensions or pension credit.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Above the result in Walsall North at the last General Election - only the Conservatives can beat Labour.

issues.socialWelfare: Pensions and the cost of living.

politicalExperience.achievements: Successful in championing the views of local people. Have been involved in many community groups. Have experience of being a school governor and have been involved in youth groups.

quotes.text: I will work hard for you on all of these issues and I will strive to deliver the honesty and integrity that you expect of being a public servant.
